participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Friendly and supportive, enjoys engaging with younger people.
participant_1.background: I love to go to Disney World every year. Mickey Mouse is my favorite character. I play with my friends on the playground. I love to sing songs from the movie Frozen. I'm in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, very passionate about music and animals.
participant_2.background: My cats are very special to me. I'm a construction worker. I enjoy building houses. I have 5 cats. My dad taught me everything I know.

content.text: hi, how are you? I am in third grade. what do you do?
So young, are you allowed to speak with strangers? I'm an adult. I work in construction.
no, I do not work. I sing from my third grade
Of course you don't. What do you mean by singing from third grade exactly?
I am not sure. I love disney world. do you play any instruments?
I do. I play the songs on my playground. do you sing? I love frozen
I do. do you have any hobbies? I sing songs. I love mickey mouse
